Package ca.ualberta.c301w13t12recipes.controller

Controller package, contains the classes for Adapters, managers and controllers fulfill the controller part of the MVC model

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DatabaseController Database controller class, used for background database handling.
GalleryAdapter Adapter for Gallery for ListView, shows images in a center-locked, horizontally scrolling list
ImageAdapter Convert an ArrayList of images to a grid view adapter for ListView
ImageManager Handling the pictures taken by camera Include: 1.
IngredientsAdapter Return an Adapter of ingredients for ListView
IngredientsFridgeAdapter Adapter for fridge ListView
RecipeAdapter Return the adapter of recipe for ListView
RecipeManager Recipe manage class, responsible for creating database controller and image manager instance
ShareController Apply basic email functionality.
WebController Class for handling web services
WebSearch Fulfill the web search functionality, handling elastic search queries, extends web controller
WebStream Fulfill the basic web service functionality including connections and up/download recipes
 

Package ca.ualberta.c301w13t12recipes.controller Description

Controller package, contains the classes for Adapters, managers and controllers fulfill the controller part of the MVC model
